wikipedia_page.main: John Wilson (1870 – after 1900), sometimes known as Jack Wilson, was a Scottish professional football utility player who played in the Scottish League for St Bernard's as an outside right. He played much of his subsequent career as a centre half or right back in the Football League and the Southern League for Lincoln City, Swindon Town, New Brompton and Manchester City.
